data.title: DayZ (short movie 4k) :: DayZ Media & streams (usermade)
data.meta_description: Hi guys, my friend who is amateur photographer is also a very passionate gamer. He decided to honor this game by making a short movie inspired by DayZ (Standalone). This is his FIRST movie/video ever, so take that into account. It is AMATEUR movie, all the cast are his friends who did not graduated or do have any experiences with acting. I think his work needs to be seen by bigger audience. For me, it was absolute mindblowing footages. Yeah, there are no CGI effects or "hollywood" tricks.
data.text:
DayZ (short movie 4k)

Hi guys, my friend who is amateur photographer is also a very passionate gamer. He decided to honor this game by making a short movie inspired by DayZ (Standalone). This is his FIRST movie/video ever, so take that into account. It is AMATEUR movie, all the cast are his friends who did not graduated or do have any experiences with acting. I think his work needs to be seen by bigger audience. For me, it was absolute mindblowing footages. Yeah, there are no CGI effects or "hollywood" tricks. As i mentioned - amateur short movie.

Here is the link:

https://youtu.be/YKRu1l0Rb6U

I WAS NOT involved in making of this movie, i'm just his friend who thinks it deserves more views. Hope i didn't violate any rules of this forum. Stay safe and happy new year :)
